sections.In the Books: It is unknown what specific name, if any, the ford had in the thousands of years that it was used before the Battle of the Trident. One of the reasons [[Arya Stark]] wandered away from camp in the part of the books corresponding to "[[The Kingsroad]]", apart from wanting to practice swordfighting with [[Mycah]], is because she wanted to search along the banks of the Ruby Ford for the rubies for which it is named. [[Sansa Stark]] insisted to her sister that in the many years since Rhaegar's death, all of the rubies have already been found.
